# FormIOr Handbook (Interactive)

Last updated: 2026-02-05

Welcome to the FormIOr Handbook. This is an interactive, multi-page manual.
Use the links below to jump to any section. Each "page" is a separate Markdown
file so it is easy to navigate and easy to keep expanding.

If you are new to FormIOr, start with Part I and Part II. If you want the
shortest path to results, go straight to the Wizard section (Part III).

Maintained by **Rodrigo Solis-Sosa, PhD** (Human Dimensions of Wildlife Specialist,
BC Ministry of Water, Land and Resource Stewardship).

<div style="border:1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius:12px; padding:12px 14px; background:#f8f9fb; margin:12px 0;">
  <strong>CHEF credentials (quick link)</strong><br/>
  Need your API key or Form ID? See the step‑by‑step page with screenshots:<br/>
  <a href="rationale/05-api-formid.md">How to Obtain the API Key and Form ID (CHEF)</a>
</div>
